Header.title: Precision Mould Engineering & CNC Solutions
Header.paragraph: Unix Mould Engineering is a trusted mould maker specializing in high-precision CNC machining and engineering solutions. We help manufacturers and industries achieve efficiency through expertly crafted moulds and engineering excellence.

About.paragraph: At Unix Mould Engineering, we are dedicated to delivering top-tier moulds and precision-engineered components. With cutting-edge CNC technology, skilled craftsmanship, and customer-focused processes, we provide reliable solutions that meet your industrial production demands.
Why: Custom moulds designed for your product needs
Durable materials and strict quality control
Why2: End-to-end project support from concept to completion
Commitment to innovation and continuous improvement

Services.name: Custom Mould Making
Services.text: We design and manufacture high-precision moulds tailored to your product requirements, ensuring quality, consistency, and performance.

Services.name: CNC Machining
Services.text: Advanced CNC milling, turning, and EDM services that deliver precision components with tight tolerances.

Services.name: Tooling & Assembly
Services.text: From jigs to fixtures, we build tooling solutions to support manufacturing efficiency and accuracy.

Services.name: Quality Inspection
Services.text: We follow strict quality control processes including dimensional verification and material integrity testing.

Services.name: Prototype Development
Services.text: We support R&D teams with rapid prototyping and short-run production to bring new ideas to life.

Services.name: Mould Maintenance & Repair
Services.text: Ensure longevity and optimal performance of your existing moulds with our refurbishing and repair services.

Testimonials.text: "Unix Mould Engineering exceeded our expectations. Their CNC quality and turnaround time were superb."

Features.title: Precision Engineering
Features.text: We focus on producing high-accuracy components that meet tight industrial standards.

Features.title: Custom Mould Design
Features.text: Our moulds are tailor-made to fit your unique products and production goals.

Features.title: Skilled Engineering Team
Features.text: Our experienced team combines deep knowledge with hands-on expertise.

Features.title: On-Time Delivery
Features.text: We value deadlines and ensure prompt delivery of every project without sacrificing quality.
